Text:
No idea why this is not showing any seeds. I am seeding it, there's 2 peers.

Also, is it just me, ir is Piratebay a little picky with searches?  I searched "avatar" to see if this would come up, it didn't. I tried again, then nothing came up, and it told me to use an asterisk.  I searched "avatar*" and found it.

Who the hell uses asterisks in searches?  Isn't it just assumed?
Cheers to seeder (just the one!). Also have 0 seeders showing up but am getting it just the same. Will leave it on my system for a week after completion ;-)
Are there other comics? I know that a new one will be out in July 2011
